documents.document: Life does not give us chances...life is our chance to give! ~Ziggy via @iheartquotes #live #run #friends #give
"If you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole #life believing that it is stupid." Einstein
"After all these years, about every week to 12 days my body just craves a long #run." -- Gary Allen
Everything you can #imagine is real.- Pablo Picaso
"I will do #today what you won't, so #tomorrow I can do what you can't" -Unknown via @timagee
You want something, go get it. Period. ~ Pursuit of #Happiness
#You got a dream, you got to protect it. People can’t do something themselves, they want to tell you you can’t do it ~Pursuit of Happiness
Don't ever let someone tell #you you can't do something. Not even me. All right? ~ Pursuit of Happiness
"This part of my #life... this little part.. is called "happiness" ~ Pursuit of Happiness
Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives #satisfaction.- Anne Frank
It is not because things are difficult that we do not #dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.~ Seneca #quote
"A little part of one dies when not living and feeling your #passion. Live it. Feel it."
"Be not afraid of going slowly; be afraid only of standing still." -Chinese proverb #start #run
Those days when it's hard 2 put 1 foot in front of the other, but those R the days when #champions R created~ McNally via @McMillanRunning
"For my part I know nothing with any certainty, but the sight of the #stars makes me dream."-Van Gogh
"The human #spirit is indomitable." -Sir Roger Bannister
"We don't stop playing because we grow old. We grow old because we stop playing." -George Bernard Shaw #doit
"If you wait to #do everything until you're sure it's right, you'll probably never do much"-Borden via @Lotay
“Never underestimate the power of #dreams and the influence of the human spirit.” Wilma Rudolph
"Most things which we think are impossible in life, is because we have never tried them. So go for every #dream"
"If you’re going to doubt something, doubt your own limits." ~Don Ward via @CharityIdeas #run
Did you know the more conservative you are, in #pace, from the beginning, the more you can push your wall back?” via @JeffGalloway
"Everyone is gifted - but some people never open their package" #live
Take risks, courage to try, dreams that come true, fall in love, discover the #run
"Never #settle for mediocrity when you can have greatness"
"Greatest danger for most of us is not that we aim too #high & we miss it, but we aim too low & reach it." Michelangelo
"Desire is the most important factor in the #success of any athlete." ~Willie Shoemaker
There is no telling how many miles you will have to #run while chasing a dream. ~Author Unknown via @LJ3000
"Everybody's got a laughin' place- trouble is most folks won't take the time to go look for it" #find #laugh #love #friends #run
And a #run--->>>The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love - Hubert H. Humphrey
The more you #sweat in practice, the less you bleed in battle. -Unknown
#Love #live #dream #chances #run
Really great people make you feel that you, too, can become great. ~Mark Twain
Decide that you want it more than you are afraid of it. ~ Bill Cosby via @iheartquotes #run
"There is a #magic formula...It's just that the magic is different for everyone" Keith Dowling
"Man never made any material as resilient as the human spirit." - Bern Williams #quote via @SusanCosmos
"Why we love our coaches! "Tell everyone what you want to do & someone will want to #help you do it." - W. Clement Stone
Discover your support system, Discover the people who step up with a helping hand, Discover what makes you smile, Discover your #run
"You just can't beat the person who won't give up." - Babe Ruth #determination
"A good #friend is a connection 2life - a tie 2the past, a road 2the future, the key 2sanity in a totally insane world" Wyse via @coachprs
"All great achievements require time." - Maya Angelou #train #run
Every person who ever achieved #greatness crossed the bridge of self-doubt. via @AffirmationSpot
Nothing limits achievement like small thinking; nothing expands possibilities like unleashed #imagination.~William Arthur Ward
"The power of someone believing in you that you can do it, can mentally change your game" #coach #friend
"Training gives me proof" John Litei #run
"Any #runner interested in maximizing potential must study the mind-body connection or their journey will not be complete" Ryan Hall
"An overflowing lust for #life...the most attractive of all personality characteristics" Matt Fitzgerald
Don’t ask what the world needs. Ask what makes U come #alive & go do it. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive~Thurman
"You've only got 3 choices in #life ➔ give up.. give in.. or give it all you've got." ~ Unknown via @livetorque
If you have to ask us why we run, you'll never understand. #run via @successfulrun
I can't imagine living and not #running ~Paula Radcliffe
Only passions, great #passions, can elevate the soul to great things. -Denis Diderot
Your purpose in #life is to find your purpose & give your whole heart and soul to it. ~Buddha
I want to do it because I want to do it.~ Amelia Earhart #run
Adventure is worthwhile in itself.~Amelia Earhart #run
"Never interrupt someone doing what you said couldn't be done."-Amelia Earhart #run
Most people have the will to #win, few have the will to prepare to win. -Bobby Knight
"To get through the hardest #journey we need take only one step at a time, but we must keep on stepping"~Chinese Proverb
#Friends are the sunshine of life." - John Hay
"Racing for me was about energy management." Frank Shorter #run #marathon
"This 26.2 is for all of the non-believers" RQ
I run because I can #getiton
You got a #dream, you got to protect it. People can’t do something themselves, they want to tell you you can’t do it ~Pursuit of Happiness
You want something, go get it. Period. ~ Pursuit of Happiness #dreams
"You just can't beat the person who won't give up." -Babe Ruth
I plan to break the rules #run #hard
Why have #good when you can have #great ~~> #goforit
Don't follow your #dreams; chase them. ~ Richard Dumb
Don't be pushed by your problems, be led by your #dreams ~Les Brown
"#Running is a journey that whether we do alone or with others, we are always together"
Don't think you got this, you got it! #run
"There is just something about people who enjoy going long" #runners
“Hope is a #good thing, maybe the best thing, and no good thing ever dies” Shawshank Redemption
Make room to receive your #desires ~ Rhonda Byrne
All great achievements require time. ~ Maya Angelou #courage
"Person born with a talent they are meant to use will find their greatest #happiness in using it." ~Wolfgang von Goethe
When you know what you #want, & you want it bad enough, you'll find a way to get it. ~Jim Rohn
"#Running reminds us that we are alive"
"The next mile is the only one a person really has to make." Eric Sevareid #run #life
Live life fully while you're here. Experience everything. Take care of yourself and your #friends ~ Anthony Robbins
"Don't let the barriers you see define what you do." Sonal Shah via @charityideas #live
A great friend knows how to take you by the hand and lift you up when you are down and if you are really lucky for a #run
"Begin each day as if it were on purpose” Radmacher #live
"After a good #run, I feel like I am capable of anything"
"The world needs #dreamers & the world needs doers. But above all the world needs dreamers that do." Sarah Ban Breathnach
"Some men see things as they are & ask why. Others dream things that never were & ask why not.” Shaw #goforit
Life is not a single path. Don't be afraid to #run on new roads
He who has begun is half done - Horace #run
Those who have abandoned their own dreams will try to convince you to abandon yours. Don't listen. #neverquit via @JoshCox
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life. ~Charles Darwin #live #love #run
"Life has no #limitations, except the ones you make." - Les Brown
"If we wait for the moment when everything, absolutely everything, is ready, we shall never #begin." - Ivan Turgenev
If you're pursuing a #dream & folks are saying, 'you can't do it, you're wasting your time' you're probably on the right track via @JoshCox
What #great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail? ~Robert H. Schuller
"We cannot waste time. We can only waste ourselves." - George M. Adams #quote via @SusanCosmos
I still get wildly enthusiastic about little things. I play w/ leaves. I skip down the street & run against the wind~ Buscaglia via @LJ3000
Put your #heart, #mind, and #soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success. ~Swami Sivananda
"The most powerful lesson you can learn in #running? You're capable of much more than you think." via @runnersworld
"Racing teaches us to #challenge ourselves. It teaches us to push beyond where we though we could go." - Patti Sue Plummer
"Nothing will ever be attempted if all #possible objections must first be overcome." ~ Samuel Johnson
